query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Plan of the Open Science Ambassador programme
result.description: The programme includes identifying and training a cadre of Open Science/ Open Research Data Ambassadors at each SEA-EU campus to provide a friendly and communicative face to the Open Science/ Open Research Data initiative.

result.title: Develop SEA-EU Open Research Data Policies and tool-kit
result.description: The policies will be developed and agreed with terms of reference that encompass the national, regional and/or university policies on data management and data sharing. Such open research data policies will entail a shared understanding of data sharing practices, in place and planned, at each of the SEA-EU universities. A tool-kit will be developed, to provide guidelines for the implementation of these open research data policies.

result.title: The re-MODULEES platform analysis
result.description: The re-MODULEES platform analysis including a number of relevant reference building typologies, matched to other relevant data, abacus and libraries that could be capitalized from other existing sources (Task 2.1), and synthesizing the general purpose knowledge base developed there into a defined, clear and integrated framework for fostering the market exploitation of TT/SS/AA scouted, across EU retrofit markets, in order to characterise buildings and markets and establish an initial diagnose on top of which integrate other services.

result.title: Best practices on Open Science
result.description: This deliverable is meant to identify acknowledge and showcase best practices in Open Science A Scoping survey will be undertaken to identify the state of play of Open Science practices at each SEAEU university On the basis of survey results the SEAEU Alliance will review and discuss the procedures methodologies and resources that are currently in place that relate to open data management practices

result.title: The re-MODULEES platform
result.description: The framework of the re-MODULEES platform is decribed and vizualized in Annex 3 of Part B. The due date is M36 but the testings will be done in M18 and M24 already (but not reported as a deliverable)
